wikipedia_page.main:
Charles Budden (18 July 1879 – 26 November 1969) was an English cricketer.
Budden made his first-class debut for Hampshire in 1900, appearing twice in matches against Warwickshire and Yorkshire.
Budden died in Winchester, Hampshire on 26 November 1969.

response: *Charles Budden, cricketer, was born in Fareham
